title: BOLD MARVEL TAKES, with Steven "Batman" Godfrey
description:
This is what happens when you get five people who have spent way too much time watching or rewatching comic book movies and then let them indulge their most polarizing selves. Captain Marvel is a NASCAR movie. Terrence Howard should have stayed as Rhodey! The MCU did Brexit! 
Thank you for listening to our college football podcast.
